attributes.action: Pay for all people whose ID has been exposed from the lost CD's from HM Revenue and Customs to have their ID monitored and so advised when any application for credit is made in their name.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government is responsible for allowing my personal details to be available to possibly anyone. They should organise that anyone whose details have been exposed to be advised when any application for credit is made in their name, or that of their children, so we can be certain accounts are not being created or used in our names. Dealing with fraudulently opened accounts would be much easier if dealt with as soon as those accounts are opened rather than when we happen to come across them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
